name: On Repeat
description:
You can find our GMTK Jam submission page here.

Controls:

Move - WASD/Arrow Keys/Left Analogue Stick on Gamepad

Interact - E/X on Gamepad (or Square, etc)

Select dialogue option - Mouse Cursor/D-Pad and A (or X, etc)

Credits:

  • Jess Molloy (Game Design, Character Art)
  • Brittney Anthony (Environment Art, Narrative Design)
  • Daniel Williams (Programming, Systems Design)
  • Sharp Loris
